events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a full refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this case under Refund due to customer's request for money back regarding wrong item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect order item.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so that we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the attached photo showing the item I received which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and the refund confirmation.
The refund has been processed successfully and the case is now resolved from our side.
We are following up to confirm you received your refund and to ensure there is nothing else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your help and excellent service!
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
